text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Ahead of international building exhibition to be held in Casablanca on Monday, Spanish promoters vow to conquer Morocan markets.
- Burglars steal 45 kg (100 lbs) of gold in jewellery in daylight robbery in southern city of Agadir.
- University teachers to stage four-day strike starting Oct 22.
- United Nations approves decision to extend financing of Mission for the Referendum in Western Sahara (MINURSO).
